[[Image:J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1998 (Italian) (glue binding).jpg|thumb]]

The '''J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1998''' was produced by the [[Italian Tolkien Society]] and features illustrations from eleven different artists: [[Maura Boldi]], [[Flavio Brunetti]], [[Ambra Colombrani]], [[Andreina D'Ambrosio]], [[Maria Distefano]], [[Gianfranco Dutto]], [[Domenico Franchi]], [[Diego Iaconfcic]], [[Alessandro Maccari]], [[Luca Michelucci]], and [[Angelo Montanini]].

* Dimension: 13 x 14 1/4 inches
* Bound at the top edge with glue
* Punched hanging hole at top

==See also==
* [[J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar 1998 (Italian wire binding)|The wire bound edition]]
